author: Connie Loizos
title: SoftBank-backed Opendoor has announced a massive layoff, cutting 35% of its employees
description: Opendoor, the seven-year-old, San Francisco-based company that has from the outset aimed to help people buy and sell homes with the “push of a button” or nearly, has just laid off more than a third of its staff. According to a statement sent to us by cofounde…
content:
Opendoor, the seven-year-old, San Francisco-based company that has from the outset aimed to help people buy and sell homes with the “push of a button” or nearly, just laid off more than a third of its staff.
According to a statement sent to us by cofounder a… [+3777 chars]
